nodes.text: A Panoramic Painting - Tatooine was a panoramic painting made sometime after the Battle of Yavin. It depicted the Tatooine landscape, with Jabba's palace being nearby.

This painting was rewarded to the player after completing the Panoramic Vistas sidequest, where they have to journey to various locations indicated on a panoramic point. The locations were Mos Eisley; a ranch; Obi-Wan Kenobi's House; Jabba's Palace; Imperial Oasis; Fort Tusken; Darklighter's Estate; the old Legacy Building; Mirage; and the Krayt Graveyard.
